title: Job Openings at Just Brand It Limited
content:
We are Just Brand It, a 360 creative agency with core competencies in developing Corporate Visual Identity Systems (CVIS), Concept Generation and Brand Management Strategies. Our goal is to provide all round brand solutions to our customers. We are built on four pillars which are Brand Communication, Designs as a service, Promotional gift items and Print and Fabrication.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Content Creator Intern

Job Location: Shomolu / Palmgrove, Lagos
Employment Type: Internship

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a talented and media-savvy intern to help develop engaging content that showcases our work, promotes our services, and builds our brand across digital platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Create visual and written content for social media, website, and marketing campaigns.
	Assist with behind-the-scenes content capturing during ongoing branding and printing projects.
	Edit videos, photos, and short reels for digital use.
	Monitor content performance and contribute ideas to improve engagement.
	Collaborate with the team to maintain a consistent brand voice and aesthetic.


Requirements


	Passion for content creation, digital storytelling, and visual branding.
	Familiarity with social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn.
	Basic skills in photo/video editing tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut, VN).
	Creativity, attention to detail, and a sense of current trends.
	Ability to work independently and within a team.


Application Closing Date: 1st December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application and CV to: careers@justbrandit.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Driver

Job Locations: Lagos Island & Ogba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Candidates should have valid driver's license and good knowledge of Lagos road network
	Proximity to location is Key.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 14th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications and CVs to: careers@justbrandit.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Business Growth Executive

Job Location: Palmgrove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a results-driven Business Growth Executive to join our dynamic branding and advertising team.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about building strong client relationships, spotting growth opportunities, and driving revenue through strategic business development.
	You will play a key role in expanding our client base, maintaining client satisfaction, and ensuring our services remain relevant in an ever-evolving market.


Key Responsibilities


	Gain an in-depth understanding of the company’s products, services, and value propositions.
	Source and secure new clients through direct outreach, networking, referrals, and team collaboration.
	Attend industry events and networking activities to identify and engage with prospective clients.
	Maintain strong, long-term relationships with existing clients to ensure loyalty and retention.
	Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling additional services to clients.
	Prepare compelling business proposals and contracts to drive revenue growth.
	Negotiate effectively with clients to secure mutually beneficial terms.
	Analyze client feedback and recommend improvements to enhance service delivery.
	Stay informed on industry trends, consumer behavior, and competitor activities to ensure service relevance.
	Meet and exceed set KPIs and sales targets.
	Develop and execute growth strategies, tactics, and action plans that deliver measurable results.
	Understand the target market and align strategies to customer needs and preferences.


Requirements


	Proven experience in business development, sales, or account management (experience in branding/advertising is a plus).
	Strong networking, communication, and negotiation skills.
	Goal-oriented, self-motivated, and able to work both independently and collaboratively.
	Excellent proposal writing and presentation skills.Strong analytical and market research abilities.


Application Closing Date: 1st December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications and CVs to: careers@justbrandit.ng using "Business Growth Executive" as the subject of the email.

Human Resources Business Partner Job at Resource Intermediaries Limited




        
    

        
        Resource Intermediaries Limited is a distinguished HR Outsourcing and Consulting firm, specializing in customized recruitment solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of companies. Our proficiency extends across a wide spectrum of positions, ranging from top-tier executives to entry-level positions, covering technical, contractual, semi-skilled, and unskilled roles. Additionally, we are recognized experts in providing a range of services including Fumigation Services, Janitorial Services, Payroll Administration, Expatriate Management, Manpower Planning, Executive Training, and more.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Business Partner
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Abuja / Port Harcourt - Rivers / Ibadan - Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Team Lead, HR Business Partnering

Job Summary


	The HR Business Partner (HRBP) will serve as a strategic liaison between clients and internal teams, ensuring seamless HR operations across recruitment, employee relations, and business performance support.
	The role requires a proactive, people-centric professional who can balance strategic HR advisory with hands-on execution to enhance client satisfaction and workforce efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage the end-to-end recruitment process for assigned client accounts and internal placements.
	Prepare and submit weekly activity reports, staff exit summaries, and monthly performance updates for clients under management.
	Conduct thorough candidate assessments to evaluate technical competence and cultural fit within client organizations.
	Support and maintain strong client relationships through consistent communication and service excellence.
	Ensure accurate collation and timely processing of client invoice payments within agreed timelines.
	Provide guidance on employee relations, policy interpretation, and HR best practices to enhance workplace harmony.
	Collaborate with internal HR teams to deliver efficient, compliant, and value-driven HR solutions.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related Social Science discipline(minimum of Second Class Lower or Upper Credit).
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in HR generalist, client-facing, or business partnering roles.
	Strong understanding of employee relations, recruitment, and performance management processes.
	Excellent people management, analytical, and communication skills.
	Proven ability to manage multiple client portfolios and deliver within tight deadlines.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and HR management systems.
	Strong networking and stakeholder engagement skills.


Core Competencies:


	Recruitment & Talent Management
	Client Relationship Management
	Employee Relations & Advisory
	Business Partnering & Stakeholder Engagement
	HR Reporting & Analytics
	Problem Solving & Strategic Thinking.


Salary


	N200,000 Monthly (plus benefits)

title: Security Operations Manager Job at Zurishaddai Recruitment Agency
content:
Zurishaddai Recruitment Agency is a one stop shop for attracting the right talent for the best offered opportunities. With a cumulative wealth of experience spanning over Eight (8) years, premium value delivery and satisfied clients' testimonials have become our culture. We have become excellent professionals at sourcing for both mid-level and entry level job positions for small-scale and growing businesses with a track record of producing results and matching the right candidates to our clients' requirements.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are a leading security solutions provider in Nigeria, dedicated to delivering top-notch security services to our clients.We specialize in VIP Journey Management & Logistics , Manned Guarding and Maritime Security We are seeking an experienced Security Operations Manager to oversee our security operations in Ikota, Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Security Operations Manager
Job Location: Ikota - Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing and overseeing the daily security operations of our company. The ideal candidate will have a military or paramilitary background and experience in security management.
	The Security Operations Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing security protocols, managing security personnel, and ensuring the safety of our clients' personnel and assets.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement security protocols and procedures to ensure the safety of clients' personnel and assets
	Manage and supervise security personnel, including training and performance evaluation
	Conduct risk assessments and security audits to identify potential threats and vulnerabilities
	Develop and implement emergency response plans and procedures
	Collaborate with law enforcement agencies and other stakeholders to ensure effective security operations
	Provide security advice and guidance to clients and internal stakeholders
	Manage security budgets and resources effectively
	Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards


Requirements


	Degree in a relevant field (Security Management, Criminology, or related field)
	Military or paramilitary background with a minimum of 5 years of experience in security management
	Proven experience in security management, leadership, and crisis management
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and make quick decisions
	Familiarity with Nigerian security laws and regulations
	Must reside in close proximity to the Island.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunities for career growth and development
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment
	Comprehensive training and development programs.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: zurishaddairecruitmentagency@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply
